item.title: Experience at a local VMUG – Barcelona VMUG
item.description: I am going to talk about my experience at a local VMUG, in my case the VMUG from Barcelona (BCN). It was my first time at a local VMUG event and this is why I decided to share my thoughts about it.VMUG – What is? As you probably knowVMUGstands for VMware User Group. Basically, you will find an international community of people where they share their experiences and discuss things related to VMware and other technologies.
